name: DocuWorks Binder File
summary: Learn about .XBD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Binders are used by DocuWorks to organize DW documents without losing any information about the DW document, such as the title, page numbers, and properties. You can also copy, rename, and reorder the DW documents in the XBD file.

To create an XBD binder, select File → New → DocuWorks Binder, then set the binder size, color, and name. You can add DW documents to a binder simply by dragging and dropping the document into the binder.
You can use DocuWorks to view XBD files. You can also view the files using DocuWorks Viewer Light for Android and iOS.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
